column3: Latest;Kampot: Immigration forces arrested a foreigner at 3.15 pm on June 20
column4: 2019 for stealing  property from a rented house in Sovan Sakor village
column6: Kampot city.------The man rented the property in  January
column8: and the owner complained that he stole 3 beds.------The man named as  IVAN YOUNG
column9: a 50-year-old reported to have an Australian passport
column10: is currently detained at the Kampot Police Commissariat waiting to follow the Provincial Court procedures.
